attributes.action: Give the British people a referendum on withdrawing from the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British people have not been allowed a vote on whether or not we want to be part of a Federal Europe. We were lied to in the 1970s about what our membership actually meant and since then have been dictated to more and more by Brussels. There are an increasing number of Directives and taxes forced upon an increasingly resentful public. We did not vote for this and it is NOT democracy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
